# Flex



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                               | Type                                                                                                                                                                                           | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignContent`   | `align-content`   | This aligns a flex container's individual lines when there is extra space in the cross-axis, similar to how "justifyContent" aligns individual items along the main axis. | `"center" \| "end" \| "space-around" \| "space-between" \| "start" \| "stretch" \| BreakpointValues<"start" \| "end" \| "center" \| "stretch" \| "space-between" \| "space-around">`           | `'stretch'` |
| `alignItems`     | `align-items`     | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the cross axis.                                                                                                              | `"baseline" \| "center" \| "end" \| "start" \| "stretch" \| BreakpointValues<"start" \| "end" \| "center" \| "baseline" \| "stretch">`                                                         | `'stretch'` |
| `direction`      | `direction`       | Defines the direction of the main and cross axis. The default "row" defines the main axis as horizontal left to right.                                                    | `"column" \| "column-reverse" \| "row" \| "row-reverse" \| BreakpointValues<"row" \| "row-reverse" \| "column" \| "column-reverse">`                                                           | `'row'`     |
| `flow`           | `flow`            | Defines the flex containers content flow if 2 or more containers are siblings of each other.                                                                              | `"block" \| "inline" \| BreakpointValues<"block" \| "inline">`                                                                                                                                 | `'block'`   |
| `justifyContent` | `justify-content` | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the main axis.                                                                                                               | `"center" \| "end" \| "space-around" \| "space-between" \| "space-evenly" \| "start" \| BreakpointValues<"start" \| "end" \| "center" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly">` | `'start'`   |
| `wrap`           | `wrap`            | If set, overflowing elements will wrap to a new line.                                                                                                                     | `"nowrap" \| "reverse" \| "wrap" \| BreakpointValues<"nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "reverse">`                                                                                                         | `'nowrap'`  |
